movie_title: NDP 2025: Show segment to extend from Padang to Marina Bay
introduction: The show segment of the National Day Parade 2025 will feature performances that will expand from the
lead_intro: Get ready for an exciting segment at this year's National Day Parade! Performances will extend from the Padang to the Marina Bay with unique elements.

quiz.question: What will the Bay Area include in this year's National Day Parade?
choices: water floats and a performance on a floating stage
quiz.answer: water floats and a performance on a floating stage
quiz.explanation: The Bay Area will include water floats and a performance on a floating stage that synchronizes with the live show at the Padang.

quiz.question: Which artists are returning to this year's parade for a duet performance?
choices: Local artists and persons with disabilities
quiz.explanation: Benjamin King and Rahima Rahim are returning to this year's parade for a duet performance, which will be a little different this time.

quiz.question: What type of artwork will be displayed on UB1 and Fitton Hotel during the parade?
choices: Art made by local artists and persons with disabilities
quiz.answer: Art made by local artists and persons with disabilities
quiz.explanation: UB1 and Fitton Hotel will be lit up with artwork made by local artists and people with disabilities during the parade.

quiz.question: What is the main intention behind all the performances and displays at the National Day Parade?
choices: To bring the audience together and connect them
quiz.answer: To bring the audience together and connect them
quiz.explanation: All the elements of the parade are intended to bring the audience together and connect them as a community.

quiz.question: How many artists and performers will be involved in this year's show segment?
quiz.explanation: 39 artists and over 3,000 performers will be involved in this year's show segment of the National Day Parade.
